headings: Become a leader in the next generation of intelligence analysts.
What Can You Do With an Intelligence and Analysis Degree?
Why Earn My Intelligence and Analysis Degree at Angelo State?
Kay Bailey Hutchison Center for Cyber Intelligence, Innovation, and Security Studies
paragraphs: The increasing complexity of national intelligence issues and intelligence analysis is driving an ongoing demand for well-rounded professionals.

When you major in intelligence and analysis at Angelo State, you will gain in-depth knowledge about the relationships between intelligence and national security that are critical to accomplishing the missions of the U.S. intelligence community and national security agencies. Our fully online, nationally-recognized program features a comprehensive degree plan that includes topics ranging from policy making and military strategy, planning and operations - to constitutional issues and the rule of law in a democracy.
*The B.I.A. degree is designed for those who already have an associate degree from the Community College of the Air Force or who are on active duty, and it is part of theAU-ABC program.
Our faculty stay up to date with current national intelligence issues and regularly publish their research. They’ll work alongside you to help you accomplish your career and educational goals.
ASU Distinguished ScholarshipsOur premier scholarships are awarded based on your academic achievement, and you don’t even have to apply. You are automatically considered once you are admitted to ASU.
General ScholarshipsWe offer over 600 different types of scholarships. You can apply for both our general scholarships and degree-specific scholarships with one application.
Blue and Gold GuaranteeIf you have financial need, you may qualify forfree tuitionto attend Angelo State.

With your degree in intelligence and analysis, you will be prepared to start or advance your career in the military, national intelligence, international relations, federal law enforcement or other agencies in the intelligence community.

Angelo State is rapidly growing its cybersecurity and artificial intelligence programs. We’ve partnered with the Texas Department of Information Resources to pilot the Regional Security Operations Center (RSOC) initiative. Qualified students can also gain marketable cybersecurity work experience through our paid internship program.

Angelo State has been designated a “Military Friendly School” and “Military Spouse Friendly School” by VIQTORY Media and G.I. Jobs magazine. We have also been named a Top 10 “Best for Vets College” by the Military Times. Our VETS Center is here to help you with your military education benefits, andTA Scholarshipsare available.

Our program has been ranked as one of the “Top 25 Bachelor’s in Intelligence and Analysis” by the SecurityDegreeHub.com college guide. In our program, you will gain the communication, critical thinking, leadership and decision-making skills that will set you apart.

Take your education to the next level in theASU Honors Program. Through special courses, cultural events, research and community engagement, we’ll help you transform your intellectual and personal talents into marketable skills for your future. You’ll also have the opportunity to participate in prestigious internships, fellowships and other programs to reach your full potential.

OurFreshman Collegeis a one-stop resource for programs and services that help you transition into college life, improve your communication skills, and engage in active learning. You can also get academic help in theMath LabandWriting Center, receive peer mentoring and tutoring throughSupplemental Instruction, or set up onlinetutoringsessions.
If you want to go fast, go alone. But if you want to go far, go together.
